<<<<<<< HEAD
The vvoefull crie of Rome Containing a defiance to popery. With Thomas Bells second challenge to all fauorites of that Romish faction. Succinctly comprehending much variety of matter ... Bell, Thomas, fl. 1593-1610.
[8], 77, [3] p.
Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for William Welby, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Grayhound, London : 1605.
Printer's name from STC. The first leaf and the last leaf ar blank. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
=======

Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for William Welby, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Grayhound, London : 1605.
